title: JLo, Seeking Sister Wives, Post Nuptial Agreements with Sarah Colonna
description:
Comedian Sarah Colonna and I cover my weekend at The Catalina Wine Mixer and why she couldn’t make it. Amber Heard’s sister is sticking by her. Can you be a victim and still lie about it? RHOA required the girls to wear vibrating panties to a Broadway Play. MTV Movie Awards featured a cameltoe and JLo who gave a great speech. Seeking Sister Wives is back and they are looking for a third wife now. RHOM Lisa’s ex is asking the court to kick her out of their $52 Mil dollar home. She should have done a post-nuptial agreement. Only Fan girls may have to go back to nursing and Mariah Carey got sued.

Subscribe on Apple Podcasts to get exclusive Extra Juicy episodes every Friday and get all episodes of Juicy Scoop, ad-free
